summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Football-Data.org API integration with real match data, live WebSocket updates, and frontend UI functionality. Football API successfully provides 109 real matches with team crests, live matches with proper prediction locking, and league filtering.

performance_issues.issue: General matches endpoint timeout in test script due to large dataset (109+ matches)
performance_issues.impact: Test script timeout but API works correctly via manual testing

passed_tests: Football competitions endpoint returns 8 competitions (PL, CL, SA, PD, BL1, FL1)
Football live matches returns 4 live matches with status='LIVE' and predictionLocked=true
Football competition matches (UCL returns 16 Champions League matches)
Auth endpoints working (register, login, nickname check)
Homepage loads with real Football-Data.org match data (109 matches)
Live matches display red pulsing LIVE badges
Team crests loading from Football-Data.org (108 team crest images)
League filter chips work (UCL→16 matches, Premier League→30 matches)
Live matches show prediction locked banners with 'Match is live' message
GUESS IT buttons show 'Closed' state with lock icon for locked matches
Vote buttons (1, X, 2) present and functional
Score displays working for live matches between team names
NOT_STARTED matches have unlocked predictions when >10 min away
